title: Thai fish soup
ingredients: ['2 white fish fillets, cut into pieces', '2 onions, sliced', '1 carrot, sliced', '1 courgette, sliced', '1 leek, sliced', '1 potato, peeled and cubed', '1 fish stock cube', '1 teaspoon Thai green curry paste', '1 inch piece root ginger, grated', '1 tin coconut milk', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander', 'squeeze of lime or lemon juice']
